GeoState.name: GeoState

Description.description: A brief description of this record.

GeoCountryId.description: ID of the GeoCountry associated with this GeoState.

IsoCode.description: Two-letter ISO code of the state as defined in the orgâ€™s State-Country picklist. This field is unique within your organization

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed data in this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, it's possible the user accessed data in this record or list view but didn't view it directly.

Name.description: The name of the state that corresponds with the ISO code.

GeoState.accessRules: The GeoState object is available if B2B Commerce or D2C Commerce is enabled.
